$schema.description: The schema to verify this document against.

dataTypeCase.description: Converts data types to upper- or lowercase.

denseOperators.description: Toggles spacing around SQL operators. (Does not apply to logical operators (AND, OR, XOR))

expressionWidth.description: Determines maximum length of parenthesized expressions.

functionCase.description: Converts function names to upper- or lowercase.

identifierCase.description: [Experimental] Converts identifiers to upper- or lowercase. Only unquoted identifiers are converted.

keywordCase.description: Converts reserved keywords to upper- or lowercase.

language.description: Specifies the SQL dialect to use.

linesBetweenQueries.description: Decides how many empty lines to leave between SQL statements.

logicalOperatorNewline.description: Decides newline placement before or after logical operators (AND, OR, XOR).

newlineBeforeSemicolon.description: Whether to place query separator (;) on a separate line.

paramTypes.description: Specifies parameter types to support when parsing SQL prepared statements.

positional.description: True to enable ? placeholders, false to disable them.

numbered.description: To allow for ?1, :2 and/or $3 syntax for numbered placholders

named.description: To allow for :name, @name and/or $name syntax for named placholders.

quoted.description: To allow for :"name", @"name" and/or $"name" syntax for quoted placholders.

custom.description: An option to implement custom syntax for parameter placeholders

tabWidth.description: Specifies amount of spaces to be used for indentation.

useTabs.description: Uses TAB characters for indentation. `tabWidth` will be ignored
